comment: Standard Carbon Fee Rate: NT$300 (US$9.34) per ton of carbon dioxide equivalent (tCO2e) for general entities subject to the carbon fee. Preferential Carbon Fee Rate A: NT$50 (US$1.56) per ton of carbon dioxide equivalent (tCO2e) for entities that apply for a self-determined reduction plan and meet the industry-specific designated reduction rate. Preferential Carbon Fee Rate B: NT$100 (US$11) per ton of carbon dioxide equivalent (tCO2e) for entities that apply for a self-determined reduction plan and meet the technology benchmark designated reduction rate.
